job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in a related field – computer science, engineering, business or related experience

jd: From: Shravan, Smart Folks INC kumar@smartfolksinc.com Reply to: kumar@smartfolksinc.com Hi Greetings from Smart Folks…!!! My name is Kumar we have a job opportunity for you as Program Manager - MDA one of our client based at Greenwood Village, Colorado (Onsite) Please find the Job description below, if you are available and interested, please send us your word copy of your resume with following detail to kumar@smartfolksinc.com Or please call me on 469 888 5467 to discuss more about this position. Job Title: Program Manager - MDALocation: Greenwood Village, Colorado (Onsite)Duration: 06 - 12MonthsStart Date: ASAP Job Summary: Key Skills:Drive the implementation of MDA cross-functional projects providing leadership, guidance, industry knowledge, influence, and energy to complete the jobBuild relationships across the organization, from senior levels to the technical teams, establishing trust and confidence to deliver the project. Need to manage not just the project, but to be a key member of the team as well.Capably manage change and risk,and communicate effectively internally and externally. Team lead but willing to roll up your sleeves as well.Strong knowledge and appreciation of project scope, deliverables, timeline and risk management, and delivery excellenceEnsure the project has the right priority to get resources assignedPlan and schedule project timelines and necessary weekly/daily or ad hoc meetingsIdentify, document, mitigate, resolve risks issues and, update program RAID as things change and evolveProvide direction and support to the project team and coordinate with MDA Program managersConstantly monitor and report on progress of the project to all stakeholdersImplement and manage project changes and interventions to achieve project outputsProvide project evaluations and assessment of results throughout and post project deployment Other responsibilities:Work with Solution Architecture, BAs, and Dev team to translate business requirements into a solution, formal agreements and plans to culminate in business acceptance of results.Responsible for organizing and leading cross functional teams in developing and project deliverables; ensure that all project work streams and tasks are properly and realistically estimated, documented, scheduled and tracked.Convey to all team members a full understanding of the requirements of the project; work with project team members and external areas to identify and resolve issues in a timely and professional manner.Preparing project artifacts such as project plan, weekly status reports, RAID matrix, minutes of meetings and any other project documentation required Skills:Sufficient functional/technical knowledge in BSS/OSS domain to enable effective communication and execution of the projectStrong knowledge and experience of Agile delivery methods and tooling (SAFe, JIRA)Must be able to make quick, thoughtful decisionsExcellent interpersonal, leadership and influencing skills to achieve successful results working closely with business areas and internal MDA resources Competencies:Critical thinkingDemonstrating tenacity and perseveranceDisplaying creativityDisplaying functional/technical expertiseAdapting to changeCommunicating and influencing effectivelyOutstanding presentation skills Education & Other ExperienceBachelor’s degree in a related field – computer science, engineering, business or related experienceMinimum 7-10 years’ experience of Project Management experience, managing and delivering complex, multi-vendor technology-based End to End projects, within a service provider environment.Strong preference for candidates with prior experience working with telco in the delivery of IT Wireless System Solutions or IT Telecommunication Solutions and other digital services companiesAbility to communicate effectively, both verbally and in writing, to interact effectively with MDA management, software development and test teams, and infrastructure teams, and with business partnersKnowledge of both theoretical and practical aspects of project management, techniques and toolsWorking knowledge of IT systems, Agile, Waterfall and SDLCStrong negotiation/facilitation skills with an ability to gain consensusAbility to facilitate solutions in a complex IT technology and business environment and able to adapt quickly to change.Ability to manage expectations throughout the project implementation and delivery process.Formal knowledge of Project management principles, processes, and tools (PMP certification is desirable)Solid experience in MS Project Plan If you are interested in the position, please fill the details: Full Name Contact Number Email Id DOB (MMDD) Current location Visa status Relocation Availability for new project Interview Availability SSN last 4 digits Highest degree / Completion Year LinkedIn Id Rate
